  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item(int index, String name, int amount, Item.Stat stat, int buyPrice, int shopQuantity)
      Creates an item with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      index - Index number denoting the item
      name - Name of the item
      amount - The amount that the monster stat is changed by
      stat - The monster stat that the item affects
      buyPrice - Buy price of item from shop
      shopQuantity - Sell price of item
